text: The Seventh-day Adventist Church in Canada is part of the branch of the Seventh-day Adventist Church located in Canada. The church started in the 1870s in Quebec. William Miller travelled to parts of Canada. In 1902, Seventh-Day Adventist churches in Canada orgainized a union conference for the country. In 2011, the church reported a membership of 61,468. Category:Protestantism Category:1870s establishments in Canada Category:Religious organizations based in Canada
title: Seventh-day Adventist Church in Canada
